info.name: Dark MyIvy
info.description: A dark version of the current theme on Ivy Tech's new MyIvy homepage.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0 - Initial release
Known issues:
 *Blocks/Applets are not separated clearly.
 *Some applets are unskinned.
 *Menus are unskinned.
 *First run
 *Unorganized/Non-Minimal
If you use this and find an issue unlisted here, please contact me through the discussion page below.
